DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Retail Proximity to Neighborhood Distance in Meter
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties._The milieu in which a product or service is promoted for sale._A surrounding or nearby region._The state or quality of being next; immediate nearness either in time, place, blood or alliance._Geographic distance measured in number of meters._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
